    14 not covered /**
    15 not covered * Compare name and semver of two modules, returning -1
    16 not covered * if the name of the first is alphabetically lower or
    17 not covered * name is the same and its an older semver
    18 not covered *

    20 not covered * @param {Object} module2
    21 not covered * @return {Number} -1 for lower, 0 for same, +1 for higher
    22 not covered */

    243304100% if (module1.name < module2.name) {
    251626100% return -1;
    26 not covered }
    271678100% if (module1.name > module2.name) {
    281599100% return 1;
    29 not covered }
    3079100% return compareVersions(module1.version, module2.version);
